nycTheatreExcerpt: "Scherzinger, in bare feet and a black slip, could use a shade more vulnerability as past-her-prime Norma. But she shows off powerhouse pipes in the show's best songs, her crowd-rousing solos "With One Look" and "As If We Never Said Goodbye."
